Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
First of all, you must pay attention
to the <RED>hearts</RED> on the upper left.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
They indicate your current <RED>stamina</RED>.
<PAGE>
<RED>If you lose all your hearts, you will
faint</RED>, so be careful!
<PAGE>
A good way to recover your stamina is
to <RED>eat something</RED>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Next, notice the <RED>face icon</RED> next to
your hearts.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The face icon shows your current state
of <RED>health</RED>.
<PAGE>
Your health changes based on whether you
are living a proper lifestyle.
<PAGE>
If you skip eating or don't get enough
sleep, your health will go down because
of fatigue.
<PAGE>
To recover health, make sure to <RED>eat
and get enough sleep</RED>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It looks like your health isn't so
good right now! Let me get you
something to eat!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Here, the food is ready!
Eat up, don't be shy!
